plans.title: Payment Plans

upfront.title: One-time Payment
upfront.description: Pay the full amount in one transaction. This plan offers the best value with an upfront discount and eliminates the need for multiple payments.
upfront.shortDescriptionWithDiscount: Pay everything once and get {{percent}}% discount

monthly.title: Monthly Plan
monthly.description: Spread your payments over multiple months with fixed monthly installments. This makes budgeting easier with predictable payment amounts.

termly.title: Termly Plan
termly.description: Pay per school term with larger but less frequent installments. Ideal for aligning payments with school cycles.

custom.title: Installment Plan
custom.description: Flexible payment schedule designed to fit your needs. Make payments according to a customized installment plan.

default.title: Payment Plan
default.description: A flexible payment option to help you manage your fees.

emptyState.title: No payment plans available for this fee
